item.title: Lost in Translation
item.author: Author
item.description: I have been blogging on and off for a while now. Most of the time I did it in English, which is, as you may have guessed, not my mother tongue. The old King I did so, because English is the main language for tech, and I blog about tech. This seemed like an obvious choice. However, I am about to change that. Indeed, starting now, I’ll blog (mainly) in French.
